strings.SCRAPYARD_DIFFICULTY_WHIRLWIND_DESC:

>Enemy Speed: <style=cIsHealth>+50%</style>
>Enemy Attack Speed: <style=cIsHealth>+50%</style>
>Gold and Experience Rewards: <style=cIsHealth>-25%</style>
